data.title: French Restaurant in Southbank, London
data.meta_description: Located in Southbank, Brasserie Blanc's contemporary French restaurant offers a truly special dining experience. Open 7 days a week. All welcome.
data.text:
Sign up to enjoy complimentary wine when you dine!* – head to our Sign Up page for more information… Bon appétit

South of the river with all of the sass! We are delighted to welcome you to our gorgeous brasserie in the heart of the Southbank arts scene. Whether you are dropping by for a pre-theatre meal or popping in for a cheeky Happy Hour cocktail we look forwarding to seeing you!

Summer has landed with our new menu. Vibrant and full of flavour, our menu transports your tastebuds to the south of France. Indulge in a delicious cherry tomato and courgette tarte drizzled with basil oil or treat yourself to our classic bouillabaisse, served with a generous side of rouille and crusty baguette. Pair with a chilled glass of Sauvignon Blanc and you have the perfect recipe for summer dining. Santé!

What’s new at Southbank BB?

Set the stage with our pre-theatre menu…

Make way for grandeur before the curtain rises as we invite you to experience our dedicated pre-theatre set menu at Brasserie Blanc, setting the stage for an unforgettable evening at the theatre.

As the anticipation builds for the evening’s performance, allow us delight your taste buds with our specially curated pre-theatre set menu. Indulge in 2 courses £19.50 or 3 courses for £24.50.

From British-grown produce to seasonal favourites, our menu promises to captivate even the most discerning palates. Sample the brilliantly green and deliciously sweet green pea featured in the pea and mint soup starter. Minted peas and peppery watercress are also being served up alongside our succulent grilled haddock, as well as chicken ballotine, steak frites and a vegan friendly chickpea salad. To complete this seasonal feast guests can sample a sweet pineapple pavlova, cherry and apple compote or a rich chocolate marquise for dessert.

So please join us and let us elevate your theatre experience…à bientôt.

Christmas at Brasserie Blanc Southbank

Chef Manoj has created the most delicious Christmas menus for this up coming festive period.

Whether you plan to dine with us with colleagues for a work Christmas party, spend time with friends enjoying our warm and friendly hospitality during the winter months or you fancy popping in for some celebratory champers, we are on hand to make your festivities fun and enjoyable.

From woodland-raised Bronze Turkey, Roasted Beetroot and Confit Onion Tart, as well our mouth-watering Apple and Blackberry crumble (to name but a few) we can’t wait to welcome you all through our doors during the most wonderful time of the year.

Christmas Party Menu from 46.50 per person for 3 courses (please note that we also have a 2 course menu) available until 24th December 2024. Please view our Christmas party menu for more details.

Please note that we are closed on Christmas Day.

EARLY BIRD OFF PEAK OFFER* – book the Christmas Party Menu any time on a Monday – Wednesday from 25th Nov – 23rd December and your guests will receive a complimentary glass of prosecco on arrival. QUOTE BLANC CHRISTMAS when making your booking on the phone to have the complimentary drinks added to your booking. Please note full terms and conditions on our website.

PRE ORDERED DRINKS OFFERS
